entry.title: DINT raid in Oakland yields firearms, narcotics, suspected stolen property
entry.summary: DINT seized 15 firearms, narcotics, cash, and suspected stolen property during a Monday raid on Wells Road in Oakland, Ore., court records say. Caleb Plueard, 42, and Erica Hewlett, 44, were arrested and charged; bail set at $70,000 and $15,000.

entry.title: DFPA decreases fire danger
entry.summary: Due to precipitation, Douglas Forest Protective Association will decrease Industrial Fire Precaution Levels to Level 2 and Public Use Restrictions to moderate for all associated lands in the Douglas District.

entry.title: DFPA Lowers Fire Precaution Levels Following Rainfall
entry.summary: DFPA has lowered fire danger levels following recent rain. Effective Sept. 9, IFPL drops to Level 2 and Public Use Restrictions to Moderate across the district. Industrial and public activities face time-of-day limits to reduce wildfire risk. Full details at www.dfpa.net

entry.title: Roseburg City Council Considers Fireworks Ban Following Recent Fire Risks
